overview: The father and son are drivers of a scenic route in Chongqing Nanshan One Tree. Old Zhao has been busy helping his son find a "good partner", and the monotonous driving life has made the young and energetic Xiao Zhao very restless and in various situations. Under a peaceful life, Xiao Zhao had been reluctant to forgive his father because of the accident that led to the death of his mother because of the alcohol abuse of old Zhao. Finally, whether the relationship between the two can find a new balance.
title: Finally Drunk
